column2: 18.5.1 Definition of Icing Conditions ▲ — What constitutes icing conditions?
column3:
Icing conditions exist when:
(1) OAT (ground/takeoff) or TAT (inflight) ≤ 10°C
AND
(2) Any ONE of the following:
Visible moisture is present
OR
Operating on contaminated surfaces (snow/ice/standing water/slush)
